pkgmetadata.longdescription: Zigzag Expanded Navigation Plots // Graphical tools for visualizing high-dimensional data along a path of alternating one- and two-dimensional plots. Includes optional interactive graphics via 'loon' (which uses 'tcltk' from base R). Support is provided for constructing graph structures and, when available, plotting them with Bioconductor packages (e.g., 'graph', 'Rgraphviz'); these are optional and examples/vignettes are skipped if they are not installed. For algorithms and further details, see doi:10.18637/jss.v095.i04.
